column2: Classification MetricsAccuracy Score>>> knn.score(X_test, y_test)Estimator score method>>> from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_scoreMetric scoring functions>>> accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)Classification Report>>> from sklearn.metrics import classification_reportPrecision, recall, f1-score>>> print(classification_report(y_test, y_pred)) and supportConfusion Matrix>>> from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix>>> print(confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred))Regression MetricsMean Absolute Error>>> from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error>>> y_true = [3, -0.5, 2]>>> mean_absolute_error(y_true, y_pred)Mean Squared Error>>> from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error>>> mean_squared_error(y_test, y_pred)R2 Score>>> from sklearn.metrics import r2_score>>> r2_score(y_true, y_pred)Clustering MetricsAdjusted Rand Index>>> from sklearn.metrics import adjusted_rand_score>>> adjusted_rand_score(y_true, y_pred)Homogeneity>>> from sklearn.metrics import homogeneity_score>>> homogeneity_score(y_true, y_pred)V-measure>>> from sklearn.metrics import v_measure_score>>> metrics.v_measure_score(y_true, y_pred)Cross-Validation>>> from sklearn.cross_validation import cross_val_score>>> print(cross_val_score(knn, X_train, y_train, cv=4))>>> print(cross_val_score(lr, X, y, cv=2))
